titles.title: A bill to renew and modify the temporary suspension of duty on ferroboron.
A bill to renew and modify the temporary suspension of duty on ferroboron.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for ferroboron; and (2) extend the temporary suspension of duty on such article.
